name: ViewSonic TD1655
shortPoints: all in one type c port
shortDescription: The ViewSonic TD1655 is a portable 16” Full HD touch monitor perfect for overcoming one-screen limitations outside the office. Extend the screen from phones, tablets, or laptops for mobile work, one-on-one presentations, or leisure entertainment. The two universal USB Type C connectors provide a one-cable solution for audiovisual, power, and touch signal transmission. The adjustable wide stand and pivot-able display will support your working angles. With the anti-slip cover, metal case, aluminum stand, and 6H hardness screen, reliability is embodied in the design.
description:
Extend your content from mobile devices

Extend your screen anywhere with your built-in USB Type C laptop, tablet, or phone. It supports Windows, Android, Chrome, MacOS, iOS and iPadOS*. Be sure your laptop, tablet, or smartphone has a full-function USB-C connector that supports Display Port 1.2 Alt Mode.

*To connect on iPhone or iPad with a lightning port, you will require to purchase a Lightning Digital AV Adapter from apple.com and connect via a HDMI to mini HDMI cable**.

**The HDMI to mini HDMI cable is included in the box.

***Full-featured USB-C connector implements Video, Audio, USB touch data transmission and power delivery.

Anywhere with Laptops, Tablets, and Phones

Audiovisual Extension while Power Charging

Broadcast your built-in Type C mobile device’s multimedia onto a bigger screen and charge (up to 60W) over one cable while powering from an external power bank/outlet over the other USB Type C cable.

*Power Charging:

1. For longer use, connect to an external power bank or outlet.

2. For temporary use, connect to your mobile device only.

1> Over 2 hours when powering from your phone - Tested with the phone's built-in battery at a capacity of 4,000 mAh.

a. The phone is on, but with a blank screen.

b. The portable monitor has a brightness value of 15 and a contrast value of 70.

c. Connected by a USB Type C cable. 


2> Over 1.5 hours when powering from your laptop - Tested with the laptop's built-in battery at a capacity of 53,546 mAh.

a. The laptop is on; the screen is on.

b. The portable monitor has a brightness value of 100 and a contrast value of 70.

c. Connected by a USB Type C cable.

Flexible Setup with 2 x USB Type C

Touch Feedback Control

Control in a large screen with touch gives more intuitive and efficient reactions. The attached magnetic touch pen allows you to draw and write notes without leaving fingerprints.

*Touch feedback control does not apply to iOS & iPadOS devices.

*Please download vTouch software to enable touch feedback on MacOS.

*Please check if the connectivity on your mobile device supports USB touch signal transmission to enable touch feedback control to our monitor.

*Do not remove the plastic disc from the tip of the pen as it is instrumental to touch accuracy functionality.

10-Point Fingertip/Touch Pen

Portable Size for Work & Fun

Larger, 16” display than most common laptops and weighing less than 1 kg. It perfectly outfits your mobile workplace, and can be used for multimedia play when taking a break.

16” Display, 1 KG, 1 CM

Working in Your Preferred Angles

View in a wide range of angles by adjusting the attached stand.

Up to 60 Degree Tilt

Supports Vertical Layout

Besides common horizontal content, you may setup a pivot screen for table-reviewing, programming, photo-editing, gaming, etc.

Pivot-able Display

Magnetic Cover and Mat

Avoid damage during carry, the detachable magnetic cover is easy to put on. Used as a mat, its anti-slip surface prevents the monitor from sliding away.

Anti-slip Cover

Robust One-piece Design

With the metal case and endurable hinge, the fold-able aluminum stand makes the whole monitor a one-piece design.

Metal Case & Aluminum Stand

Anti-scratch Touch Screen

Built-in 6H hardness screen, it’s resistant to surface damage, even if accidently scratched by your keys.

6H Hardness Screen

specifications.title: USB 3.2 Type C Up Stream; DisplayPort Alt mode

name: ViewSonic VA2215-H
shortDescription:
• Eyecare technology for comfortable viewing
  • Eco-mode for low energy consumption
  • ViewMode color rendering options
  • 75Hz Adaptive sync to eliminate screen tearing and reduce stuttering
  • HDMI and VGA inputs for connectivity.
description:
The ViewSonic VA2215-H is a 22” Full HD monitor with HDMI and VGA input for business or home usage. Delivering a stunning image quality with low power consumption, this monitor provides six ViewMode presets that deliver optimized screen performance based on your needs. FreeSync means no tearing or stuttering even when gaming. The eye care technology that comes standard with all VA monitors helps to eliminate eyestrain from extended viewing periods. A VESA-compatible mount makes this monitor is easy to setup on the wall or with a wide range of industry-standard mounts.

Viewing Clarity from Wide Angles

Enjoy superb performance and better viewing quality from horizontal to vertical angles. With SuperClear® Vertical Alignment panel technology, the monitor remains clear and in good contrast color from 178° all around, whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front, or the side.

SuperClear® 178°/178°

Full HD 1080p

Full HD 1920x1080 resolution creates unbelievably clear pixel-by-pixel image performance. Experience amazing clarity and detail while working, gaming, or enjoying the latest entertainment.

Full HD 1080P

AMD FreeSync™ Delivers Smooth, Continuous Visuals

With AMD FreeSync™ technology, it eliminates screen tearing and choppy frame rates to provide seamless, flawlessly smooth visuals in every scene.

75Hz FreeSync

Comfortable Viewing

Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods.

Flicker Free

Blue Light Filter

Color Rendering Options

ViewSonic’sViewMode feature offers “Game”, “Movie”, “Web”, “Text”, and “Mono” presets. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast, and brightness to deliver an optimized viewing experience for different uses.

ViewMode: Game/Movie/Web/Text/Mono/Mac

Low Energy Consumption

Designed for energy efficiency in mind, ViewSonic’s Eco Mode results in a smaller carbon footprint and reduced office overhead costs.

Eco Mode

I/O ports

  1. Joy Key
  2. Power in
  3. HDMI 1.4
  4. VGA
  5. 3.5mm Audio Out
  6. VESA Compatible
  7. (Wall Mount 75 x 75mm)

name: ViewSonic VX3276-MHD-3
shortDescription:
• SuperClear® IPS Technology
  • Frameless Bezel and metallic triangle stand
  • Full HD 1080p resolution
  • 75Hz Refresh Rate with Adaptive Sync
  • HDR10 Support
  • Flicker-Free and Blue Light Filter
  • HDMI, DisplayPort and VGA inputs
description:
The ViewSonic VX3276-MHD-3 is the perfect blend of style and performance with features that include a sizeable 32” (31.5'' viewable) Full HD display and minimalist design. With an ultra-slim profile, metallic silver triangle stand, and sleek edge-to-edge frameless bezel, the monitor has a premium feel that fits nicely both at home and in the office. VX3276-MHD-3 features 1080p resolution, IPS-type panel technology, and support for industry-standard HDR10. Combined with dual-integrated speakers, this monitor produces astonishing visual and sound effects from multimedia content.

Premium Design

With an architecturally inspired design aesthetic fused with modern form factors, the ultra-slim profile, frameless bezel, and unique triangle stand form a sleek, minimalist monitor.

SuperClear® IPS-type Technology

Enjoy rich, vivid color with consistent levels of brightness, no matter the vantage point. With SuperClear® IPS-type panel technology, the VX3276-MHD-3 monitor delivers the same image quality whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front, or the side.

Full HD 1080p

The VX3276-MHD-3 features Full HD resolution for pixel sharp images. Experience amazing clarity and detail whether working, creating, or catching the latest shows.

Adaptive Sync Delivers Smooth, Continuous Visuals

With Adaptive Sync technology, screen tearing, and choppy frame rates are eliminated to provide seamless and smooth visuals in every scene.

Adaptive Sync

HDR10 Delivers Incredible Contrast and Color Accuracy

This monitor is compatible with the industry standard HDR10 high dynamic range, so color, brightness, and contrast are more defined and exceed the capabilities of ordinary monitors.

HDR10

ViewMode Optimized Settings

ViewSonic’s ViewMode includes optimized Game, Movie, Web, Text,vMono, and Mac presets. Each preset offers specialized enhancements to deliver the optimal viewing experience for different scenarios.

Comfortable Viewing

Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods.

Powerful Sound

VX3276-MHD-3's dual integrated stereo speakers deliver powerful sound. When paired with incredible screen performance, the combination provides complete multi-sensory immersion.

Low Energy Consumption

VX3276-mhd’s energy-saving Eco-mode is ENERGY STAR compliant and incorporates energy efficiency and power savings into the monitor’s stunning screen performance.

IO Port

  1. Menu Controls
  2. DisplayPort
  3. HDMI
  4. VGA
  5. Audio In
  6. Earphone
  7. AC Power In

name: ViewSonic VG2448
shortDescription:
• vDisplay Manager (free download)
  • Narrow bezel
  • HDMI, DisplayPort and VGA inputs
  • SuperClear IPS technology
  • Versatile stand design
description:
ViewSonic VG2448 is a 24” (23.8’’ viewable) 1080p monitor with productivity enhancing features including IPS technology and an advanced ergonomic design for the modern day office. Utilising SuperClear® IPS technology and 1080p resolution, VG2448 delivers a crisp, clear image from any viewing angle. An advanced ergonomic design offers the widest range of customisable adjustments currently available to provide maximum comfort, including dual direction pivot, swivel, height adjustment, and an impressive 40° tilt, which enables you to use the monitor while standing and to have strategic group discussions around the screen. VG2448 uses environmentally friendly packaging and offers quick and easy out-of-the-box set-up via the Quick Release stand. The cloud client mountable stand coupled with cable management design features, makes VG2448 perfect for deployment in cloud-based environments. Versatile connectivity options include HDMI, DisplayPort, VGA, and USB 3.2 inputs.

Adapted to Every Angle of Your Work

VG COLLECTION

Meticulously Crafted

 

Striking lines and a small footprint are what make the VG2448 special and the monitor’s minimal modern design fits perfectly into any workspace.


A New Angle on Workplace Ergonomics

Enjoy every detail with advanced ergonomic include pivot, swivel, and height adjustment to provide a greater range of customizable adjustment for maximum comfort, VG2448 is the first monitor features a 40° ergonomic tilt angle, which enable you to use the monitor while standing or to have strategic group discussion around the screen.

 

Pivot ±90° Swivel ±60° Tilt 40°~-5° Height Adjust 0~130mm

vDisplay Manager

ViewSonic’s proprietary vDisplay Manager software is available for free and allows users to organise and divide their screen into multiple segments. The software also enables users to adjust their monitor settings via the software directly for a more efficient workflow.

 

Spilt screen

Monitor settings

LEARN MORE

Seamless Viewing

VG2448 has been designed with a narrow bezel on 3 sides, giving the monitor a clean look and a seamless flow when used in a multi-monitor setup.The inner edge of the bezel has been angled to directthe user’s focus to the center of the screen.

3-sided Narrow Bezel Angled Bezel Edge

Connection Flexibility

HDMI, DisplayPort, VGA, and USB 3.2 inputs enable you to connect an array of devices to VG2448.

HDMI DisplayPort VGA USB 3.2 x 5

Clarity From Any Angle

Enjoy accurate and vivid colours with consistent levels of brightness no matter your vantage point. With SuperClear® IPS Panel Technology, VG2448 monitor delivers the same image quality whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front, or the side.

IPS 178°/ 178°


Versatile Stand Design

VG2448’s versatile stand is equipped with a cloud client mount on the back of the stand along with cable management design features that keep your workspace neat and free of cable clutter. A carrying handle sits at the top of the stand for stability when relocating the monitor.

Cloud Client Mount Cable Management Carrying Handle

4-step Assembly

VG2448 utilizes a new quick release stand design which lets you attach/detach the panel with the push of a button. Can be assembled entirely by hand in four simple steps:

Cleverly designed package for fast assembly

Quick Release Stand4.Set it up anywhere - it’s ready to go!

Eco-conscious Construction

Low Energy Consumption

VG2448 has been designed with energy efficiency in mind. With certification from Energy Star and EPEAT, VG2448’s Eco Mode consumes less power, resulting in a smaller carbon footprint and reduced office overhead costs.

Energy Star EPEAT

Audiovisual Experience

Immersive Audio

Designed with dual integrated speakers, VG2448 accents its incredible screen performance with immersive stereo sound for a complete multimedia experience.

Dual Speakers

name: ViewSonic VG2740V
shortPoints: Ergonomic flexibility with quick release stand
shortDescription:
• Built-in Full HD webcam and microphone 
  • Adjustable vertical angles for greater frame control 
  • Webcam slide cover ensures total security and privacy  
  • Ergonomic flexibility with quick release stand  
  • Minimized Total Cost of Ownership
description:
The ViewSonic VG2740V is a 27” Full HD video conferencing monitor designed to deliver out-of-the-box video conferencing and high-quality live streaming capability. The built-in Full HD webcam allows you to easily adjust the vertical angles to better frame yourself during VC calls and create more engaging content through varied camera angles, while the easy-to-use cover slide ensures total privacy and security when not in use. Providing the full spectrum of ergonomic flexibility, the VG2740V can tilt, swivel, pivot, and height adjust to adapt to any setup or workflow, and the exceptional inbuilt microphones and dual 2W speakers ensure you can hear and be heard with absolute clarity and professionalism. Combined with the vDisplay Manager productivity software for efficient multi-tasking and streamlined on-screen display control, the VG2740V is the complete solution for anybody looking for a professional live streaming or video communication experience.

An All-in-one Video Conferencing and Live Streaming Setup

Complete with a built-in Full HD webcam, microphone, dual 2W speakers, and supporting software, the VG2740V delivers high-quality, out-of-the-box video conferencing and streaming capability.

Built-in Full HD Webcam

More Control Over How You’re Seen

Easily adjust the vertical angles of the webcam up to 5 degrees both ways to ensure you, your team, or your content is perfectly framed every time.

Adjustable Vertical Angle

Simple Slide Cover Ensures Privacy and Security

The built-in webcam includes an easy-to-use slide cover to ensure complete privacy and security when not in use. Slide it open when the camera is on and simply slide it shut when you’re done.

Webcam Cover Slide

Complete Ergonomic Flexibility

Effortlessly swivel the display up to 120 degrees, tilt up to 40 degrees, raise the display up to 130mm, or pivot 90 degrees for portrait viewing. The VG2740V offers the full range of ergonomic flexibility for every task and workflow.

Swivel, Tilt, Pivot and Height

Crisp Audio for All Through Built-in Speakers and Microphone

Ensure quality audio in all video calls and live streams with exceptional inbuilt microphones and dual 2W speakers designed to deliver crystal clear sound for you and your listeners.

Dual 2W Speakers

Easy Multi-tasking for Increased Efficiency

Work smart with efficient OSD command and control through vDisplay Manager. Personalize split-screen displays, auto-launch applications, and customize display settings to maximize multi-tasking abilities and overall efficiency.

vDisplay Manager Software

Consistently Impressive from All Angles

SuperClear® IPS panel technology delivers the same top-class image quality from above, below, front, and side for accurate and vivid colors with consistent brightness from any angle.

IPS Panel

Advanced Eye-Care Technology

name: ViewSonic TD2455
shortDescription:
• Versatile touch applications
  • Accurate yet smooth touch experience
  • USB Type-C one cable solution
  • DisplayPort out supporting Daisy Chain
  • Highly adjustable working angles to suit different needs
description:
With responsive in-cell touch technology and an advanced ergonomic design, the ViewSonic® TD2455 touch monitor delivers hands-on control for more productive workspaces and collaborative classrooms. With high-performance in-cell touch technology, this 24” (23.8” viewable) Full HD display provides smooth and responsive touch tracking, along with amazing screen performance, within a sleek and bezel-less design. USB Type-C connectivity offers a single-cable plug-and-play solution for laptops, while DisplayPort output enables easy screen mirroring or extended desktops ideal for office productivity and podium touch applications such as conference rooms or classrooms. A magnetic stylus pen lets you write or draw on screen, and easily attaches to the display stand for secure storage. So whether used on its own on office desktops, as a presentation station in corporate meeting spaces, or as a front-of-classroom interactive teaching hub, the TD2455 helps to boost efficiency and productivity. *Some laptops may need to enter BIOS mode and change the power management setting to “tap-to-wake”.

Versatile Touch Applications

Whether used as a check-in kiosk at reception, as a collaboration station with co-workers and colleagues at the office, or as a touch podium for front-facing teaching, this sleek and slim touch display seamlessly integrates into your workflow for boosted efficiency and productivity.

Agile yet Scalable Touch Display

Efficient Multitasking

With advanced DisplayPort Multi-Stream technology and support for up to 4-screen daisy chaining*, this display can transform into the ultimate touch screen workstation – in mirror and extended modes – for increased productivity. *up to 4 with a PC; up to 3 with a laptop

DisplayPort Multi-Stream Transport (MST)

Touch Annotation for Presentations

An included stylus pen easily attaches to the magnetic base of the display, and allows you to draw, write notes, or perform other detailed tasks that require more accuracy than your fingertips alone. The pen is especially useful during presentations when the TD2455 is attached to a projector.

Fine Writing Stylus

Accurate yet Smooth Touch Experience

Powered by in-cell touch technology, the TD2455 offers sensitive yet smooth touch response for detailed content editing with fingertips or the touch pen.

10-Point In-Cell Projected Capacitive (PCAP) Touch Technology

Quickly Start Your Work

The latest USB Type-C input transforms this display into a powerful hub by enabling easy connectivity to PC, laptop, and Chrome systems. In addition, it delivers charging power, video, and audio over a single cable.

USB Type-C

Comfortable Working Angles

Designed with an ergonomically advanced dual-hinge stand, this display can be tilted and adjusted to deliver a more comfortable user experience.

Ergonomic Dual-Hinge Design

Incredible Images, Sleek Design

With high-performance in-cell touch technology, this display provides smooth and responsive touch tracking, along with amazing screen performance, within a sleek and bezel-less design.

In-Cell Projected Capacitive (PCAP) Touch Technology

Minimal Design Concept

The ergonomic stand features an integrated client mount for quick installation of optional mini PC mount on the back of the display. Cable management features also keep your workspace neat.

Optional Mini PC Mount

Extra Features

VESA compatibility, low energy consumption with Energy Star, SuperClear® IPS technology, blue light filter, and flicker-free

shortPoints: 4K UHD(3840* 2160) resolution IPS panel with 27” frameless design
Support USB-C with 60W high-speed charging, plus HDMI 2.0, DisplayPort 1.2a, USB3.2
VIEWSONIC VP2756-4K 27" 4K UHD PANTONE VALIDATED 100% SRGB & FACTORY PRE-CALIBRATED MONITOR WITH 60W USB-C
shortDescription:
• Lifelike True Beauty: International color standard Pantone validated and 100% sRGB wide color gamut
  • Precise Color: ColorPro Verified with pre-factory calibration for overwhelmed Delta E < 2 color accuracy
  • Multimedia Devices: Support USB-C with 60W high-speed charging, plus HDMI 2.0, DisplayPort 1.2a, USB3.2

description:
Designed with creative professionals in mind, the ViewSonic VP2756-4k delivers stunning true-to-life colors on screen. Pantone validated 100% sRGB coverage provides precise color reproduction, ensuring your work looks how it should, every time. A USB-C port that easily connects with your devices for easy charging and data transfer. Ergonomic engineering gives you the flexibility to do more without injury, while Auto Pivot lets shift between horizontal and vertical orientations effortlessly, letting your work be viewed how it’s supposed to be.

Introducing VP56 Series

Inspiration starts within,

then appears to the world on the ViewSonic VP2756-4k,

delivered with stunning true-to-life,

high precision colors on an UHD frameless screen,

with an ergonomic stand and USB-C support.

See your work how it's supposed to be seen.

Powerful Color

Fit for Your Workflow

Multitasking Master

Going Above and Beyond

Powerful Color



Bring Your Colors to Life

100% sRGB color gamut that meets industry standards and can produce color precisely.

Pantone® Validated ensures high levels of fidelity in simulating the full range of real-world colors.

These two features combine to give ColorPro® VP2756-4k high fidelity color accuracy, empowering every creative to get their colors right, every time.

100% sRGB Pantone® Validated

Precise Color

With Delta E < 2 color accuracy, the ColorPro® VP2756-4k delivers stunning color reproduction that ensures the colors in your videos and photos are true-to-life and nearly indistinguishable from the color seen by the naked eye.

Delta E < 2

Conventional

Source Material

Delta E < 2

Exquisite Quality out of the Box

Every unit is pre-calibrated at the factory and comes with its own color calibration report. Giving you the highest quality color calibration possible, right out of the box. Time spent fine-tuning ColorPro® monitors bring you the highest quality color calibration possible.

Please download your customized report HERE

Pre-Factory Calibration

Fit for Your Workflow

Big Picture, Small Details

Maximize your creative output in magnificent clarity with a 4K UHD (3840 x 2160) resolution panel. With more than eight million pixels on screen – up to 300% greater density than other Full HD monitors – you never need to miss a detail again.

4K Ultra HD Resolution

Designer Credit @Ersin Acir

Find Your Perfect Angle

With a full range of swivel, pivot, tilt, and height adjustments, The ColorPro® VP2756-4k allows you to find the most comfortable monitor positioning for your workflow. Auto Pivot can even let photos to be automatically adjusted to the screen’s orientation when pivoted.

*Please download the vDisplay Manager software before activating the Auto Pivot function

Auto Pivot Ergonomic Stand


Imagery has been simulated for demonstration purposes

Multitasking Master

Next Generation Connectivity

Do away with messy tangles of cables once and for all. USB-C connectivity allows for the transfer of data, video, and audio, all from the same port. Clean up your workstation and reduce the need for additional ports and adapters in one easy step.

Lightning-fast charging

Never leave your desk with half dead devices again. USB-C transmits power at 60 W letting you charge all your devices right at your workstation, while you work.

USB-C 60W

Speed Up Your Workflow

Multitasking has never been easier. Run multiple windows side-by-side and switch between layouts to suit the task at hand. Split Screen helps you clean up your desktop and speed up your workflow.

*Split Screen is the feature of vDisplay Manager and the software is free to download HERE.

Split Screen

Performance Beyond Boundaries

Whether for work or play, get immersed in whatever you're doing with the stunning screen that is borderless on three sides.

See more, do more.

3 Side borderless

Versatile Connectivity

HDMI, DP in, and USB-C inputs offer more flexibility for connecting the VP2756-4k with your other devices.

HDMI DisplayPort USB 3.2 Gen 1 USB-C

name: ViewSonic VA2432-mh
shortPoints: 24” IPS Monitor Featuring HDMI and Speakers
shortDescription:
• SuperClear® IPS Technology for richer, sharper colors at wide angles
  • Full HD 1080p resolution
  • 75Hz Refresh rate delivers fluid visuals
  • Adaptive sync to eliminate screen tearing & reduce stuttering 
  • Three-sided frameless design for seamless viewing
  • Dual integrated speakers
description:
The ViewSonic VA2432-MH is a 24” (23.8” viewable) Full HD Monitor with IPS technology and flexible connectivity for use in the office or at home. With SuperClear® IPS technology and Full HD resolution, images are clear and detailed from a wide range of viewing angles. Integrated speakers ensure a crisp and clear sound while HDMI and VGA inputs allow for increased setup flexibility when connecting with other devices. The VA2432-MH’s three-sided frameless bezel delivers a seamless viewing experience and comes equipped with Eye Care technology to help eliminate eye strain resulting from extended viewing periods. VESA compatibility guarantees easy adaption to both multi-monitor or wall-mount set ups.

SuperClear® IPS

Enjoy rich vivid color and consistent brightness no matter the vantage point. With SuperClear® IPS panel technology, the monitor delivers consistent image quality weather you are looking from above, below, the side, or in front of the display.

178°/178°

Full HD 1080p Resolution

This monitor features Full HD 1920x1080 resolution for unbelievable pixel-by-pixel image performance. You’ll experience amazing clarity and detail whether working, gaming, or enjoying the latest in multimedia entertainment.

1080p

75Hz Refresh Rate

With 75Hz refresh rate, this monitor delivers great visual fluidity and flawless graphics no matter how quickly the in-game action unfolds.

75Hz

No Screen Tearing & Less Stuttering for Moving Objects

To meet a variety of frame rates from videos or games, the Adaptive Sync provides a wide variable refresh rate of 48 to 75 Hertz support to avoid screen tearing.

Adaptive Sync 48 - 75Hz

Three-sided frameless design for seamless viewing

With a three-sided frameless bezel, the monitor delivers clean and seamless multi-monitor setup capabilities.

Three-Sided Frameless

Dual Integrated Speakers

Designed with dual integrated speakers, this monitor combines impressive screen performance with big stereo sound for an immersive multimedia experience.

2W Speakers

Flexible Connectivity

HDMI and VGA inputs give you the freedom to connect your monitor to a wide range of devices.

HDMI, VGA

ViewMode: Superior Color Rendering & Intuitive Settings

ViewSonic’s unique ViewMode feature offers “Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” and “Mono” presets. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast, and brightness to deliver an optimized viewing experience for different screen applications.

“Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” “Mono”, and “Mac”

Comfortable Viewing

Flicker-Free technology and Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eyestrain from extended viewing periods.

Flicker-Free & Blue Light Filter

Low Energy Consumption

VA2432-MH’s energy-saving Eco mode takes energy efficiency into consideration while at the same time offering stunning screen performance.

Eco Mode

VESA-Compatibility

Mount the monitor where you see fit by using its VESA-compatible mount.

75mm x 75mm

description:
OVERVIEW

ViewSonic VG2748 is a 27" (27" viewable) 1080p monitor with productivity enhancing features including IPS technology and an advanced ergonomic design for the modern day office. Utilising SuperClear® IPS panel technology and 1080p resolution, VG2748 delivers crisp, clear images from any viewing angle. An advanced ergonomic design offers the widest range of customisable adjustments currently available to provide maximum comfort, including pivot, swivel, height adjustment, and an impressive 40° tilt, which enables you to use the monitor while standing and to have strategic group discussions around the screen. VG2748 uses environmentally friendly packaging and offers quick and easy out-of-the-box set-up via the quick release stand. The cloud client mount on the back of the monitor stand coupled with cable management design features, makes VG2748 perfect for deployment in cloud-based environments. Versatile connectivity options include HDMI, DisplayPort, VGA, and USB 3.2 inputs.

Adapted to Every Angle of Your Work

VG COLLECTION

Meticulously Crafted

Striking lines and a small footprint are what make the VG2748 special and the monitor’s minimal modern design fits perfectly into any workspace.

Notable design features include:

  • A tilted button design
  • Angled bezel edges to direct the user’s focus to the center of the screen
  • A slanted stand with cable management for more comfortable usage
  • An angled metallic carrying handle to make transporting the monitor easier

ViewSonic’s proprietary vDisplay Manager software is available for free and allows users to organise and divide their screen into multiple segments. The software also enables users to adjust their monitor settings via the software directly for a more efficient workflow. 

Spilt screen

Monitor settings

Uninterrupted Viewing

VG2748 has been designed with a narrow bezel on 3 sides, giving the monitor a clean look and uninterrupted viewing when used in a multi-monitor setup. The inner edge of the bezel has been angled to direct the users focus to the center of the screen.

3-sided Narrow Bezel Angled Bezel Edge

Connection Flexibility

HDMI, DisplayPort, VGA, and USB 3.2 inputs enable you to connect an array of devices to VG2748.

HDMI, DisplayPort, VGA, USB 3.2 x 5 (1 up, 4 down)

Clarity From Any Angle

Enjoy accurate and vivid colours with consistent levels of brightness no matter your vantage point. With SuperClear® IPS panel technology, the monitor delivers the same image quality whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front, or the side.

SuperClear® IPS 178˚/ 178˚

Versatile Stand Design

VG2748's versatile stand is equipped with client mount kit compatibility on the back of the stand along with cable management design features that keep your workspace neat and free of cable clutter. A carrying handle sits at the top of the stand for stability when relocating the monitor.

Client Mount Kit must be used to attach a mini PC. Client mount kit sold separately.

Client Mount Kit Compatibility Cable Management Carrying Handle

4-step Assembly

VG2748 utilizes a new Quick Release stand design which lets you attach/detach the panel with the push of a button. Can be assembled entirely by hand in four simple steps:

Cleverly Designed Package for Fast Assembly

Quick Release Stand

1.Open the box

2.Screw on the monitor base

3.Clip the stand onto the panel with the Quick Release stand

4.Set it up anywhere- it’s ready to go!

Eco-conscious Construction

Low Energy Consumption

VG2748 has been designed with energy efficiency in mind. With certification from Energy Star and EPEAT, VG2748’s Eco-mode consumes less power, resulting in a smaller carbon footprint and reduced office overhead costs.

Energy Star EPEAT

Environmentally Friendly Packaging

Designed with the environment in mind, the packaging for the VG48/VG55/VG55-2K series is made with up to 80% recyclable and paper based materials instead of hazardous EPS (polystyrene). Additional plastic materials, such as handles, have been replaced with hand holes and the exterior of the package uses mono color printing.

Paper-Based Packaging

Audiovisual Experience

Immersive Audio

Designed with dual integrated speakers, VG2748 accents its incredible screen performance with immersive stereo sound for a complete multimedia experience.

Dual Speakers

Advanced Eye Care Technology

Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help eliminate eye strain caused by harmful light rays and periods of extended viewing.

Flicker-Free Blue Light Filter

seoDesc: 32” 2K QHD Monitor Featured Built-In Speakers

name: VIEWSONIC VX2428
shortDescription:
• Fast IPS Display with HDR10
  • AMD FreeSync™ Premium for smooth gameplay
  • VESA AdaptiveSync for tear-free gaming experience
  • VESA ClearMR for clarity of action 
  • Rapid 0.5ms MPRT for crisp image
  • 165Hz refresh rate for smooth gameplay
description:
OVERVIEW

No matter how often you game or when you game, you always win with the Omni VX2428. The triple certification of AMD FreeSync™ Premium, VESA Adaptive Sync, and VESA clearMR allows you to savor distortion-free gaming and enhanced clarity. The sharp frames and outstanding color performance are delivered by a fast IPS panel, while the VX2428's high 165Hz refresh rate supports smooth visuals and minimal input lag. You may think it doesn’t get better than this, but it does. Not only will you get the job done — be it grueling gaming sessions, video and photo editing, or office assignments — you'll be working on a sleek, beautifully designed monitor.


VX2428 165Hz Gaming Monitor​

UNINTERRUPTED PLAY


With great power comes great gameplay. You need to work, but there's more to life than that. With the rare triple certification of AMD FreeSync Premium, VESA Adaptive Sync, and VESA ClearMR technology you're equipped with anti-tearing and anti-blur technology, so you can enjoy lag-free action and sharp visuals, even in fast-paced games. This monitor has the power that gives you the edge, all day, all night.

MAXIMIZE EVERY MOVE

OMNI VX2428’s hyper-responsive 165Hz high refresh rate ensures immaculate gaming and pristine video editing without needing to overclock. Smooth, flawless visuals give you the advantage of accurately hitting your targets, time and again, no matter how swiftly they move. When every frame counts, you don't want to miss a thing.

FULL SPEED AHEAD

Aim with precision and react at lightning speed with the OMNI VX2428’s 0.5ms (MPRT) / 1ms (GTG) response time, serving you top-notch performances and seamless pixel transitions without smearing or motion blur. This secret weapon will have you in the lead as you grind the ladder of your favorite FPS, as well as make the most of every thrilling scene in films.

VIBRANT CLEAR COLOR

OMNI VX2428’s fast IPS panel caters for superior color performance, both in accuracy and brightness, so you can get your head in the game. Revel in life-like details while achieving incredible responsiveness. Paired with the monitor's wide viewing angles, you'll always have the best seat in the house.

MORE DEPTH, MORE COLOR, MORE CONTRAST


With exceptional control over gamma adjustments offered by the latest HDR10, you access a whole new level of image clarity and unparalleled detail. Relish deep contrast, rich color, and vibrant details when exploring otherworldly realms, browsing holiday shots, or rewatching cherished movies.

EASY ON THE EYE

In addition, blue light protection and flicker-free technology prevent eye fatigue, so you can lose yourself in the game, even when you've entered the twilight zone.

FLICKER-FREE

We take eye care seriously so you can play without a care in the world

BLUE LIGHT FILTER

Our blue light filter protects your eyes all week long

UNLIMITED CONNECTIVITY


Don’t choose between PC or console anymore. Experience the freedom that comes with multiple connectivity solutions, including two HDMI 1.4 ports and one DisplayPort 1.4, all supporting 165Hz refresh rate so you can have all your peripherals plugged in all at once. Jump from one to another without wasting a second on setup.

HDMI x 2

DisplayPort 1.4 x 1

3.5 Audio Out

seoDesc: 27” 165Hz Fast IPS Gaming Monitor

name: VIEWSONIC VX3418-2KPC
shortDescription:
• 21:9 Ultrawide expansive display
  • 144Hz refresh rate for smooth gameplay
  • 1ms (MPRT) response time for precision
  • 1500R Curved screen for immersive visuals
  • Adaptive™ Sync prevents screen tearing
  • Adjustable Stand
  • HDR10 visuals
description:
OVERVIEW

Engineered for truly expansive visuals, the ViewSonic VX3418-2KPC features a stunning, 34” ultrawide display. With a rapid 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms MPRT response time, games are rendered with smooth, blur-free visuals. A clean design and 3-side borderless display enhances this big screen experience even further. The ultrawide 21:9 aspect ratio and 1500R curvature provides an immersive experience for both productivity and gameplay. Adaptive™ Sync technology synchronizes your monitor and GPU outputs, virtually eliminating tearing and stuttering during your gameplay. VX3418-2KPC is also equipped with ViewSonic’s exclusive ViewMode™ presets, which offer optimized screen performance for a variety of needs, such gaming, editing, or watching movies. In addition, a DisplayPort and HDMI inputs offer flexible connectivity for gaming and entertainment.

Panoramic Gaming

A 21:9, ultrawide aspect ratio expands your field of view for more action, more gameplay and deeper immersion. From first-person shooters to open-world RPGs, your gaming experience is being upgraded.

Ultrawide 21:9

Seamless Gameplay

Never miss a frame of the action with the rapid 144Hz refresh rate. Eliminate lag and motion blur to experience smooth gameplay and flawless graphics across the entire display.

144Hz

React Instantly

Response time is crucial, and the fast 1ms (MPRT) response time delivers smooth images without streaking, blurring, or ghosting. For all fast-paced action sequences, you’ll be glad your monitor reacts as quickly and precisely as you do.

1ms MPRT

Perfect For Console

Built for a true next-generation console experience. Compatible across PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S, enjoy a library of games that are built to deliver entirely new console gameplay with smooth, ultra-sharp visuals.

Brace for true darkness​

See and move fluidly in the shadows with ViewSonic’s Black Stabilization feature. When enabled, the darkest scenes are lit up for enhanced visibility so you can spot the finer details and stay ahead of the pack.​

Ultimate Immersion

The 34” ultrawide 1500R curved screen provides an expansive and flexible gaming experience. A balance of comfort and immersion, you can benefit from immersive gameplay across the whole screen or split the screen to match your gaming needs.

1500R Curve

Prevent Screen Tearing

Adaptive™ Sync technology synchronizes the output of your GPU to the monitor, eliminating tearing and stuttering for clear visuals no matter how intense the gameplay gets.

Worlds with Color

Enhance your content with HDR10. See every rendered detail across game environments with rich color, deep contrasts and clear highlights and shadows.

Render Every Detail

The ultrawide display features a crystal clear resolution of 3440 x 1440. Your gameplay will be rendered with incredible detail across the expansive display.

Clarity from Wide Viewing Angles

Enjoy superb performance and better viewing quality from horizontal to vertical angles. With SuperClear® Vertical Alignment panel technology, the monitor remains clear and in good contrast color from 178° all around, whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front, or the side.

SuperClear® 178°/178°

User-Customized Game Mode

ViewSonic’s exclusive ViewMode™ offers specialized presets to fit different usage scenarios. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast, and brightness to deliver the optimal viewing characteristics for each application. The Game Mode integrates pre-calibrated FPS, RTS and MOBA game settings with in-game testing and adjustments for the best blend of color and technology.



Dual Integrated Speakers

Powerful 5W dual speakers accents the incredible screen performance with stereo sound to complete your gaming experience.

Viewing Comfort

Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help reduce eye strain and fatigue from extended screen time during a gaming marathon.

name: VIEWSONIC VX2719-PC-MHD
shortPoints: Full HD resolution for rich detail
shortDescription:
• 240Hz refresh rate for smooth gameplay
  • 1ms (MPRT) response time for precision
  • 1500R Curved screen for immersive visuals
  • AMD FreeSync Premium prevents screen tearing
  • Full HD resolution for rich detail
description:
OVERVIEW

Get ready to game on the VX2719-PC-MHD 27” Full HD display. Take your experience further with the immersive 1500R curve, which puts your gameplay in focus. The ultra-responsive 240Hz display provides pro level refresh rates so you can stay ahead of the competition ad enjoy ultra-smooth gaming no matter how intense the action gets. A clean design, with 3-side borderless display and sleek dimensions create a product that delivers all you need. AMD FreeSync Premium virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering for a fluid gaming experience. And the 1ms MPRT response time enables you to react in-game with complete precision. VX2719-PC-MHD is also equipped with ViewSonic’s exclusive ViewMode™ presets, which offer optimized screen performance for a variety of needs, such gaming, editing, or watching movies. In addition, a DisplayPort and HDMI inputs offer flexible connectivity for gaming and entertainment.

Seamless Gameplay

VX2719-PC-MHD features an ultrafast 240Hz refresh rate that delivers esports level experiences. Lag and motion blur are virtually eliminated providing incredibly smooth visuals. Whether first-person shooters, racing or real-time strategy, your gaming and PC experience is upgraded with fluid motion and flawless graphics.

240Hz

Ultimate Immersion

Immerse yourself further into the action with a 27” curved screen. The deeper 1500R curvature strikes the perfect balance of comfort and immersion.

1500R Curve

React Instantly

Ultrafast 1ms (MPRT) response time deliver smooth visuals and minimizes motion blur and ghosting. When you are deep in the action, you’ll be glad your monitor reacts as quickly as you do, helping to claim more victories.

1ms MPRT

Brace for true darkness​

See and move fluidly in the shadows with ViewSonic’s Black Stabilization feature. When enabled, the darkest scenes are lit up for enhanced visibility so you can spot the finer details and stay ahead of the pack.​

Prevent Screen Tearing

FreeSync Premium enables smooth gameplay by synchronizing your GPU and monitor outputs, allowing games to be more immersive, and giving you an advantage over the competition

AMD FreeSync Premium

Render Every Detail

Experience every detail of your game with an expansive 27”, Full HD display. The high-definition display showcases all the action, and all the glory, with incredible detail.

Clarity from Wide Viewing Angles

Enjoy superb performance and better viewing quality from horizontal to vertical angles. With SuperClear® Vertical Alignment panel technology, the monitor remains clear and in good contrast color from 178° all around, whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front, or the side.

SuperClear® 178°/178°

Mega Dynamic Contrast

A mega dynamic contrast ratio of 80M:1 creates depth in images by adding more definition to the darkest and brightest colors on the screen to ensure images are shown with the finest details.

User-Customized Game Mode

ViewSonic’s exclusive ViewMode™ offers specialized presets to fit different usage scenarios. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast, and brightness to deliver the optimal viewing characteristics for each application. The Game Mode integrates pre-calibrated FPS, RTS and MOBA game settings with in-game testing and adjustments for the best blend of color and technology.

Dual Integrated Speakers

The monitor accents its incredible screen performance with dual, 2-watt speakers. Incredible stereo sound to complete your gaming experience.

Viewing Comfort

Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help reduce eye strain and fatigue from extended screen time during a gaming marathon.

Worlds with Color

Enhance your content with HDR10. See every rendered detail across game environments with rich color, deep contrasts and clear highlights and shadows.
